meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the part of a chromosome that is lightly stained and active in transcription.
meanings.sent1: The euchromatic region of the chromosome is where all the important genetic information is stored.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the euchromatic areas of chromosomes to understand how genes are expressed.
meanings.sent3: The euchromatic chromosome was the life of the genetic party, always busy with gene transcription.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a euchromatic canvas, ready to transcribe the colors of knowledge into action.
meanings.sent5: The euchromatic section of the chromosome glowed brightly with the activity of gene expression.
